actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to authorize the payment of subsidies to public and private urban mass transportation systems to enable them to provide services to the elderly at reduced rates.

summary.text: Authorizes, under the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964, the payment of subsidies to public and private urban mass transportation systems to enable them to provide services to the elderly at reduced rates.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to authorize the payment of subsidies to public and private urban mass transportation systems to enable them to provide services to the elderly at reduced rates.
